SessiaCrowdsale.setStartTime (/unique_chucks/4/0xa24e9ad2c71f4968175d41536a8999e93c3c20f9.sol#539-544) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < _at) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa24e9ad2c71f4968175d41536a8999e93c3c20f9.sol#540-541)

SessiaCrowdsale.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/4/0xa24e9ad2c71f4968175d41536a8999e93c3c20f9.sol#629-642) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endTime || (mintCapInETH - totalWei) <= 1e18) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa24e9ad2c71f4968175d41536a8999e93c3c20f9.sol#632-635)
